y_flags: Have yellow color to your skin
y_means: You are at higher risk of having non-alcoholic fatty liver
r_means: You need to be evaluated by a health care professional immediately.

g_flags: Take medicines as directed by your health care provider
y_flags: Have abdominal pain, or swelling in your abdomen
y_means: You may have liver disease or your liver disease is getting worse

g_flags: Practice good health habits, including hand washing
y_flags: Have stool that is pale, tar-colored or bloody
r_flags: Persisting fever, vomiting, and abdominal pain

y_flags: Whites of your eyes appear yellow
Feel nauseated or lose your appetite
Have CHF and it is not well controlled
